name: OP. After-Mass N1
description: A game project developed by one man, featuring up to 4k resolution of textures, five unique styles contain in one map. Powered by advanced global illumination and Ray-Tracing enabled to simulate real world visual quality. If you interested you can even join me with this project, bring fun to others.

name: Other People's Fiancee Became My Woman
description: You are a gentleman, one night ~ you heard the sad cry of the girl next door, to comfort her, you knocked on the door and entered her room...

name: Overworld Heroes
description: A randomizer adventure where you play as a hero trying to bring order to a land that changes locations, loot, key items, and dungeon order!

name: Out of Jail
description: Out of Jail is a multiplayer game that is in development, where the objective is to escape from prison together with other players by solving different challenges in each match. One player in the match will take on the role of the jailer and must prevent the players from escaping the prison.

name: Outline Dust
description: An out-of-this-world arcade racing game, run through beautiful landscapes, train your coordination and enjoy becoming the greatest racer in the universe...

name: Outlaw Driver Simulator
description: Drive super-tuned cars into the Open World of underground and illegal racing through city streets. Simulate repairing and upgrading the performance or appearance of unique high-performance cars. Outsmart the police pursuits and earn a fortune in the rivalry as an Absolute Outlaw Driver!

name: Out of Control
description: Out of Control is a platformer where the controls randomize each level!

name: Restless Kids
description: Restless Kids is a multiplayer thriller game. A group of children try to undermine the reever's job in choosing the neighborhood. But it should not be forgotten that the reever is a police officer. CHILDREN YOU HAVE 15 MINUTES!

name: Reflection
description: Reflection is a colorful first-person platformer. It's just you, music, and a tower on the horizon.

name: Reborn: Fate of Gods
description: Reborn is a first person psychological horror game. You have to survive from gods awakening and need to find out how to get more strength while you are surrounded with enemies.

name: Primula
description: Sci-fi visual novel with full-fledged Live2D animation.

name: Primordials Legends: Hollow Hero
description: Primordials Legends: Hollow Hero tells the tale of Brunt, an anthropomorphic Combat Wombat on her first adventure in the fantasy world, Eridal. Embark on this epic 3rd person action-filled adventure, uncover how this world came to be, and meet new legends that will help shape the future of Eridal!

name: Primal Omen
description: Explore a lush tropical island overrun by fierce dinosaurs. A tense third person survival horror experience against tenacious creatures. Unearth why dinosaurs roam the earth once more.

name: Pretty Kitty Fuzzy
description: Pretty Kitty Fuzzy is a 2D "bullet-hell" shmup! Help Fuzzy save the universe with the power of love and positivity through nine whimsical stages. There are tons of lore and features in this puuurrr-fect shoot-em-up!

name: Raise
description: Explore a dark world, face powerful enemies and bosses.

name: Q'Redux
description: In this Celtic-Egyptian, open-world fantasy, you play a healer on a personal journey to rescue a mentor. Learn powerful new sorceries as you discover magic, mix salves & help alt-gendered spirits in this souls-lite, action-RPG. Burn, Grow, Heal, Summon, Transform, Control. The power is yours.

name: Quacky Oliver
description: A horror survival adventure game where you try to survive the night from a monstrous rubber duck. Use a water physics system, a hose & a flashlight to explore a suspicious daycare & fight Quacky Oliver.

name: Quantum Vision Board
description: Sit back, relax & follow the meditation to the Zero Point Focus in your mind. This is a VR version of the vision board used for creating what you want to manifest in your life. Place items on the quantum grid and allow the voice to help you navigate the mental & emotional requirements for creation.

name: Racecar Bed
description: A Social Sim + Turn-Based RPG with a 3rd grade protagonist! Each day, choose between fighting through your worst nightmares or making friends to gain new items/powers! PLAN your days, BEFRIEND characters, CRAFT unique attacks, and FIGHT your inner monsters!

name: Raga
description: Raga is a game set in the Slavic realities, in which the cultures of the East and the West intertwine. The gameplay combines elements of a city-builder and an extensive economy known from RTS games. The game is saturated with many elements of Slavic mysticism, full of beliefs, myths, and monsters.

name: Raid Healing
description: Raid Healing is a single player healer RPG with focus on collecting and improving equipment. Based on MMO healer gameplay, you have to heal the raid you created while fighting waves of enemies.

name: Public Bounce
description: Public Bounce is a collection of erotic stories, narrated by a sensual presenter. The game is full of girls willing to have sex in risky and exciting places. No matter the place or time, they all want to feel the excitement of risk while enjoying the guilty pleasure with their partners.

name: Psion Protocol
description: Bullet-hell game. Face endless enemies in Survival Mode. Psion Themed! Earn experience and survive as long as possible! Unlock Powers and Gear. Complete achievements! Mix Psions, Powers and Gear each run! Playable with one hand. Rhythm Based.

name: Pseudo-Psy Play
description: Pseudo-Psy Play is an eccentric blend of side-scrolling shooter and point-and-click quest. The time has come – face your fears in this bone-chilling story-driven horror adventure that feels (and looks) like nothing else in the genre. Are you ready, Joseph?

name: Ronin: Samurai Redemption
description: The Ronin - Three samurai whose master was framed for disgrace in the high court and ordered to kill himself, are now alone. Instead of accepting the same fate, the samurai swore an oath of vengeance and became RONIN.

name: Rustwalker Legends
description: Explore sandbox maps across the galaxy to catch bounties using visceral melee combat, or from afar with your ranged weapons. Bring the loot back to the hub and craft new gear and upgrade your home.

name: Rustystreet
description: Every day, tens of thousands of dreams are born, destroyed and reborn

name: Safe House Simulator
description: Safe House Simulator is a realistic simulator of building a safe house that protects residents from the dangers of the modern world. Design, build and survive one of the selected apocalypses.

name: Screech of Steel: Gladiators
description: Gladiator fights online in a free multiplayer game for PC and mobile devices. Create characters, buy weapons and armor, and participate in gladiator battles in up to 5x5 mode. Immerse yourself in the world of gladiatorial battles of ancient Rome!

name: Scissors in Hell
description: Scissors in Hell is a madcap 1st person Dungeon Crawler. Slice demons (in turn-based combat), explore among the flames (in real-time), then make a cool base (in hell)!

name: Scarlet Tale
description: A unique ARPG Survival mix about scouting an escape path for a cursed carriage fleeing deep into the forgotten wildlands. Explore the woods, find resources that will keep you alive. Develop relationships with the remainder of the squad and survive the suicide mission.

name: OnOrbit: Virtual Space Lab
description: OnOrbit is a virtual space lab lets you assemble and operate space hardware as if you were actually in space. Make your own craft in a sandbox mode, then simulate its operation as part of the Supernational Space Cooperative (SSC). Climb the ranks and head out to the planets.

name: Sanri
description: SANRI is a first-person psychological horror game where you play a schizophrenic patient whose wife disappeared during camp. Face the delusions, solve the mystery and try to find her despite your constantly distorted perception of time-space.

name: Samurai Pig : The Way of the Rooster
description: Samurai Pig: The Way of the Chicken is a brutal Action RPG. Tragedy has thrown the Zodiac and the very world into disarray. You are an exiled pig, who must return to the blade to protect the world. Crush rogue deities. Protect your chickens. Save your bacon.

name: Samuda Interval
description: Samuda Interval is a visual novel, slice-of-life, murder mystery & supernatural game. You play the daily life of Park Haewon, a college freshman attending classes, working part-time jobs, and meeting new people. Solving the serial kidnapping & murder case is your highest priority.

name: Sailing Wizard
description: This is a real-time ARPG game with the theme of navigation. You can freely choose spells upgrade routes, recruit various team members, build exclusive ships. Trade, fight and explore with different factions on a journey full of adventurous spirit.

name: Sailors: Age of Corsairs
description: Become a merchant, pirate, or privateer in the 17th century Caribbean! Join colonial powers or fight for gold and glory in this epic sandbox crew simulator!

name: The Host: Cataclysm
description: After a Post-Armageddon event the world has gone back to its roots living in simpler times, back to swords, kings, and war. After the hero has chosen evil the world is left in ruins as everyone struggles to survive in this new found world.

name: The Evil of Mutant
description: Game features ・JRPG ・Easy operation ・No complicated explanations ・Addictiveness that gets you hooked in 5 minutes from the start ・There are so many mini game

name: The Evil Furry
description: Your choices are all that matter in this adventure comedy. Solve mysteries, survive the furry and fight for love but beware of the consequences of your decisions.

name: The Director's Cut
description: The Director's Cut is a story-driven psychological horror game set in a 1984, USA. Redefine your meaning of horror. Using DREAMu.

name: The Day After
description: Floods, raging hurricanes, and weather anomalies cause great havoc around the globe. People are forced to leave their homesteads. Each day becomes a challenge and a fight for survival.

name: The Blood Games
description: 100 players awake in a room alongside a prize of $1 Billion. Your goal, pass 7 deadly challenges and be the last one standing.

name: The Blunderbuss
description: The blunderbuss is a powerful bomb created by the most secretive cartel in the DR. They involve Eduardo, an ordinary man who must prevent the detonation of that unique bomb to protect his loved ones before... Blunderbuss!

name: The Chase
description: “The chase” is a first-person survival horror game developed by RAM Studios. The story revolves around a couple that has been separated for some time. The only hope for him is to strive through the darkness and pray to God that everything will be alright.

name: SuperColony
description: A real-time ant colony simulation game set in the hostile world of insects. Fight for resources, build underground networks, learn from the environment, harvest DNA from insects, evolve new ant abilities and guide hundreds of ants toward building a global SuperColony.

name: Super Jigsaw Puzzle: Generations - Landscapes 2
description: Puzzles of Landscapes!

name: Super Snow Tubes
description: Join Polar, Pengu, Seal and their adorable animal buddies for a fun and fierce snow tubing tournament! Set in a wonderful world of colorful courses, Super Snow Tubes is a satisfyingly cute, retro-inspired fun racer for players of all ages, featuring pretty pixels, quirky characters and catchy tunes!

name: Super Vecter Elite Turbo
description: You're the pilot in a scouting ship sent ahead of the mothership to ensure the area is clean and safe for its passage. You have to hunt down, at insane high speeds, all the enemies that might get in your way and clear a path for the home that's racing behind you.

name: Survive the Fall
description: Scavenge, Craft, Build and Fight! Survive the Fall is an open-world action game with a rich story. Collect loot & fight to rebuild your community and its base. Uncover the secrets of the fallen world after a meteorite strike!

name: Tactical Recon
description: Battle your way through many levels in an epic journey to free your country from an enemy invasion in this 2D action game, gather gold and buy more stuff, that you probably would not buy in real life.. like a double barrel shotgun with split-in-two-fire-two-ways mechanism! Or even a Jet pack!

name: Take the Wheels!
description: Take The Wheels! is a sci-fi kart racer with a twist. The control scheme is all wrong! Using asymmetric thrust (like for a tank or plane) and a variety of normal (and odd) powerups, power your way to victory in this "interesting" take on kart racing.

name: Soul Dier
description: Soul Dier is a story-driven grid-based and turn-based tactical JRPG. Embark on a adventure to retrieve the lost memory and delve into the world's mysteries. Fight against the evil legion with your allies on the journey!

name: Souldead
description: The awakening of Hell has awakened you. Go through different worlds to catch the Messiah of Hell and take back what was taken from you. Souldead is a fast-paced dark fantasy FPS shooter with a modern take on the gameplay.

name: Soothing Farmer
description: Manage your farm and take care of your plants. Make new friends by completing the quests of the locals. Learn new skills and expand your knowledge of crop farming as a result. Master the art of cultivation and become the ultimate farmer!

name: Solomon Division
description: Solomon Division is a co-op horror game where you play as an employee of agency that hunts demons invading your country. Play together with your friends as Technician or Medium and seal the demons. Walk the path from a beginner agent to the veteran whose name makes the Devil himself shiver in fear.

name: Slime Hero
description: Slime Hero is a slime collecting and fighting game, you need to collect and select the best slime team to pass all the stage, after that you can go to challenge the boss, try to dodge all the attack and kick away all the enemy.

name: Snapshot Aquarium
description: Snapshot Aquarium is an aquarium simulator with photo shooting mechanics. (yes yes, you need this.) Create cozy habitats for your fish, unlock new content in arcade-style photo challenges and visit other players!

name: Snowtracked
description: Snowtracked is a relaxing game that sets you free to explore a dynamic winter landscape from a cabin deep in the woods. Your trails remain - no matter how far you go... and you can see them from a birds-eye view. Find good places to doodle in the snow!

name: Slaughter Bots
description: In 2057 entertainment is not experienced but lived as injected nanobots react to your VR contact lens HUD to give pain and pleasure and where AI can self learn and mutate to eliminate crime and terror.

name: Spaceport Crew
description: Fuel and fix ships as fast as you can in this Simulation Time Management game.

name: SpaceCrooks: The End of Time
description: SpaceCrooks is a hybrid rail-shooter/flight-sim (Starfox-clone) that combines roguelite gameplay with an unlocking comedic sci-fi visual novel. Follow kAla, ♩♩B₄♯♩C♭♩E♭, and [Rigb'g] as they carve a path of mayhem in this genre soup.

name: Spirits of Yendor
description: Fight your way through the hordes of Baalzebub with your ghostly followers. Loot items for your followers to use, and sacrifice them to increase your power for the next assault.

name: Spotfight
description: Excitement, teamwork and rivalry await you in the game Spotfight. In quick rounds you fight 3 against 3 in a multitude of disciplines. Work together as a team to outperform your opponents and secure victory!

name: Springy: A Bounce Adventure
description: Help Springy and his friends on a fantastic 3D adventure in an unknown world full of dangers.

name: Spirit & Stone
description: A kingdom's open ended journey from a small village to a patchwork of bustling castles. Build your kingdom block by block. Explore the world, grow your industries, and watch your citizens thrive in your creations. Do it your way - there are no wrong choices.

name: Soul Merger
description: As the Soul Merger you'll harvest the souls of your opponents and use their powers to your advantage. Merge them with weapons or empower your waves in this strategical wave-based ARPG. Combine exploration, wave-management, crafting, combat and looting to grow your powers and decimate your fores!

name: Super Artificial Intelligence Psike
description: Super Artificial Intelligence Psike is a 2D platformer Action game. The Epic story is about an A.I who want to be a human and a man who does not want A.I . Speedy Action part, cool visual novel part and cinematic cut scene will take you to a future world.

name: Summon, then build an invincible harem
description: Spiritual Summoners-They can use the Mana in their bodies to summon spiritual people from another world. Your mother is going to travel far, and only left you a letter, and a...beautiful spirit war girl "Shirley". what are you going to do with the summoning technique of the spirit?

name: Sully: A Very Serious RPG
description: A fantasy comedy story jrpg with (optional!) turn-based combat.

name: Sugoi Adventure! DragonSlayer
description: A game of choices where you get to become a hero, impress hot girls, and slay a dragon.  Choose your own adventure and make it truly sugoi!

name: Sudocity
description: Build your city, solve puzzles, and rule the urban jungle in this minimalist masterpiece of city-building and sudoku. New citizens arrive on each season, will you be ready to welcome them?

name: Stylish Guards
description: Stylish Guard is a stylized first person shooter. Join your friends in a PvP x1, Steal the Flag or Team Kill match. Are you in the mood for one more adventure? Get together with your friends in Campaign mode! Fight monsters, zombies, bosses and more!

name: Stunt Derby
description: Stunt Derby is a throwback stunt car racer with high-fidelity physics, online play and a built in track editor. Master tracks, build your own, explore a variety of game modes and smash through stacks of boxes in this unique low-poly drive-em-up.

name: Stroll
description: A dystopian dungeon crawler, where you loot, craft and kill your way to rebuild society- one stroll at a time.

name: Virtual AI: Aki & Mika
description: A touching, feeling, and melting experience. Looking for a sweet VR game?

name: Virtueror: The Virtual Conqueror
description: Virtueror is an RTS with 4x and RPG elements. Your mission is to conquer new worlds and to extend your domain over the whole galaxy. Build your base, command your units, gather resources, set up defenses and crush anyone challenging you. Have no mercy and the universe will be yours!

name: Virus Remedium
description: Virus Remedium is a high-adrenaline fast-paced action shooter taking place in an incredible rich biological environment full of deadly viruses, pathogens and bacteria mutating in real time.

name: Vendetta: Mafia Wars
description:
The year is 1940 and the rules of the game has changed. The underground world in the United States is reborn along with new bosses. As a real-time strategy game, our product offers you the atmosphere of those times with all its glory by placing you in the heart of the mob wars that shaped the USA. Form your family, manage your economy, forge alliances with other families to outsmart your rivals.

While everybody is talking about the war in Europe, you must reshape the criminal underground and will have a sit down with six families to do so. Create your criminal empire and run your family, expand your turf and protect it against rivals. You are free to choose which path to take to be the greatest; find allies and prove your worth to them or back stab all and show how power hungry you are. Ultimately destroy all and be the real king of the city!

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Parliament of Knives: What Stares Back
description: Play as a vampire of the insightful clan Malkavian or the manipulative clan Lasombra! New powers, new secrets, and new romance options await within.

name: Vacation Adventures: Park Ranger 14
description: Help run Pinecreek Hills National Park Have fun organizing Summer Season events on Bluewaters Lake, Cherokee River & Apache Nature trails.

name: Urbano: Legends' Debut
description: Hang out during the day, hunt urban legends at night. Make new friends and fight to the beat.

name: Urban Farmer
description: Urban Farmer is a gardening simulator that lets you plant and harvest crops in major cities worldwide. See how geographically accurate climate conditions influence your hard work. Budget for your garden and design it to your liking, with trellises, raised beds, and a wide variety of accessories.

name: Voidhunter
description: In a dystopian spacefaring future, mankind struggles to maintain their humanity. Take control of devastating spacecrafts, upgrade their loadouts and offer justice to the highest bidder. Become a space-traveling mercenary. Become the voidhunter.

name: VR Funhouse: Christmas Edition
description: A snowy, holiday themed virtual reality game that's all about interacting with the environment in an immersive way. Throw objects, smash presents, break a window. Heck destroy anything you can, you don't have to pay for it.

name: Wake World
description: Explore the new world with your friends in the world of wakes. Fight off hordes of skeletons and fight pirates on the open seas the choice is yours! Discover new islands, master spells, craft a new rifle or help out the villagers of Wake World in this Multiplayer, Open World, Action RPG.

name: Warfront 2020
description: Warfront 2020 places you in the middle of an on-going battle between two forces comprised of units from the mega-powers currently running the world. duke it out with bots in our pre-alpha, including multiple early access weapons, modes, and maps.

name: Warpsquad
description: WARPSQUAD is a space exploration rogue-lite in an ever-changing galaxy to be played solo or co-op. Encounter a wide range of hostile spaceships, special events, and upgrades to your ship and crew. Master the ship terminals and crew with unique traits to survive this hostile world.

name: Watashi Suzume
description: Shamrock Creations is proud to present Watashi Suzume. A story that explores the far reaching impacts that love, friendship, and understanding have on not only our own lives, but how we view life itself. All wrapped up in a typical anime inspired narrative we hope everyone will enjoy.

name: WASD Quartet
description: A narrative game where you'll play music with robots. Explore places, and play in rhythm to discover all the secrets of this world.

name: Wingsuit Thrill
description: Fly over beautiful landscapes to relax and enjoy the view. Or challenge yourself whenever you feel the need to spice up your flight. It's up to you!

name: Winery Simulator
description: In the Winery Simulator, you will take control of an old and neglected vineyard. Through your work, it will regain its former glory.

name: Wild Lotus
description: This work is a secondary creative game work with the theme of Oriental project. The game type is the survival sandbox class. Many players are online to collect all kinds of materials and improve their combat ability

name: Wiener Wars
description: After a horrific science accident in a secret world war 2 laboratory, all of humanity is ripped through space time only to be reintroduced as sentient wieners. The war still rages. How will we get out of this mess? Who knows? But we can only figure that out once we’re doing killing…

name: Wicked Island
description: Adult open world survival with sex defeat system, pregnancy, player building and much more. Combat horny monsters, build your home, craft your gear, customize your character and build pets! Fight your way trough dungeons, caves, and ruins across the map.

name: Wheeled Warriors: Ultimate Destruction
description: Even if civilization is gone, humanity still loves high-speed racing. In Wheeled Warriors you drive through the post-apocalyptic streets of destroyed cities. Build your own savage war machine by choosing the right weapons, armor, customizations and more.

name: When Honor Dies
description: In this hack and slash, action-packed single-player adventure, honor has failed you you. Your ideals have crumbled. Will you give up or take back what was stolen from you? Answer the call of the Dark Spirit and take your revenge. Do not let hatred consume you. That is what happens When Honor Dies.

name: Whim
description: On the surface, a 2D platformer right out of the '80s video game playbook. The eponymous Whim walks and jumps his way through static rooms, avoiding the baddies and other hazards, and collecting various items. But this game is so much more than that...

name: Whispering Abyss
description: Whispering Abyss is a top-down rogue-like in the setting of Lovecraftian horror. Play as Grace as you navigate the treacherous abyss and rid Dululth of its monsters with your trusty dual revolvers! Descend into the madness in a procedurally generated abyss, collecting loot to aid your quest.

name: White : The Hero's Return
description: Just a hardcore, lore-deep RPG based on your choices.

name: Wicked
description: Wicked is a first person co-op horror survival game for 1-4 players. They say something evil lives in the house. Explore the house with your friends and find out if the rumors are true.

name: Wispera
description: Wispera is a procedurally generated, open-world sandbox survival game. Craft weapons to battle monsters at night, or expand your base and create a safe haven. If you prefer to remain mobile, travel away and explore new places. Whether you’re a monster hunter or a builder, the choice is yours!

name: Without Judgement
description: Without Judgement is a third or first person open world action rpg. Set in the futuristic Florida, you are going to be able to freely explore the countless cities and settlements across the state. Experience engaging and dynamic quests and random encounters which can be solved in multiple ways.

name: Wizards of Chaos
description: Become the Wizard who brings Chaos and Destruction to the world of Evil before It gets you! Destroy and loot everything in this Action Roguelike RPG. Find Artifacts, learn spells and expand your game with every achievement. Control your Wizard with only your mouse or one stick.

name: WorldsKeeper
description: In Worlds Keeper, you have the opportunity to interact with different worlds in different universes and times. Your mission is to protect these different worlds from waves of increasingly formidable enemies and obtain the title of Worlds Keeper.

name: World of Buh
description: Take control of the destiny of a Buh as he makes his way through an adventurous retro wave world populated by many other Buhs. Some may help you to find what's this all about... but most of them will try to get in the way and do what only the one and only choosen of the Buhs can do.

name: Worm Goes to Hell
description: Worm Goes to Hell is a short, first-person adventure horror game. You’ve been dropped into Designation: Hell - a strange town in the middle of nowhere where some seriously weird stuff is going down. Buildings are merging, there are bodies everywhere, and you can sense something following you.

name: Wormwood
description: WORMWOOD is a narrative-driven strategy game where your goal is to govern an infected city. Become an Arbiter that has arrived to stop the spread of an unknown disease and delve deep into the mysteries of a small mining town. Give out orders and fight the pestilence while searching for its origin.

name: Zombie Hell: Infected City
description: Zombie Hell is an FPS where you take on the role of the head of a family – a father fighting for his family's survival, lest they all meet a grim end at the rotting hands of a zombie horde in an apocalyptic city.

name: ZodiacChild
description: Escape the spiritworld, turn back time, and find out why - by chasing the 12 animals of the Chinese Zodiac before it's too late.

name: Zero Page
description: Your life depends on a machine that struggles to count higher than 256. But with a little bit of BASIC and a lot of cunning, you may just live long enough to escape a dying spaceship with a mind of its own. Let's hope eight bits are enough.

name: Yukyo Station
description: A story-driven, 2D, action packed, rogue-like platformer set in a fictional nation's metro system infested with the supernatural.

name: Yougen
description: Yougen is a Japanese-style 2D action game in which the main character, chosen as an emissary of God, touches the reason of the world while accomplishing the request.

name: Yesterdreamt
description: In this twin-stick Metroidvania, you face an onslaught of unimaginable horrors armed only with a six-shooter and your Wit. Shoot your way through a crumbling world, uncover secret magicks and find your way back home. Above all, don't forget who you are.

name: Z.O.N.A Project X VR
description: Z.O.N.A Project X is a single-player survival shooter in VR. Explore the Chernobyl zone filled with apocalyptic landscapes and dangerous anomalies. Defend yourself with firearms, scavenge for loot, and save humanity from certain doom.

name: Fairy 2
description: 个人独立开发的修仙放置风竖版休闲游戏，以电子游戏的形式为大家展示第一批修仙的人可能成功了的背景下，"人法地,地法天,天法自然"理念的故事。一个没广告,无需肝,无需氪的小游戏,,30m大小,一个相对来说比较休闲,自由的小游戏！炎炎夏日,漫漫修仙,来仙贰坐坐可好！游戏虽小,五脏俱全,

name: Century 0: Parasitic Tower
description: It was a utopian tower born in the middle ages because of people's jealousy and desire for happiness and peace.All the happiness of nothingness comes from it.

name: Whacky Park
description: 恭喜你通过面试，成为这个乐园的检票处的一员，在这动荡的时代，有一份工作是十分令人羡慕的...

name: Star Blues
description: Our mysterious protagonist wanders through the vast alien ruins, constantly searching for the core of the ruins with his robot companion who has lost its memory. Fight hordes of out-of-control enemies to reach the core, and witnessing the secrets buried in the deepest recesses of the ruins.

name: The last four
description: The waking girl lost her memory? There's a zombie in an empty base? What is the cat guarding? Sleeping girl , is she eager to wake up? What's the wandering boy doing? Can we find out what happened on this base, get our happiness back? A little AVG game. I hope you like it.

name: Consciousness' Unity of Opposites
description: 在被遗忘者的圣地——幻想乡，不可思议的魂灵在各处无声地诉说。燃着的笠木、妖异的望月，此世的幻象在引向何处？独属于「生人」的卷轴已然合起，由此展开的绘卷又出自谁人的笔下……成为结界中的少女，一探「寂然之世」异闻的真相吧。二千三百年间积淀的愿景，就要于此再现……

name: Nightmare without return
description: This is a journey without return When you wake up... In the strange space, the bronze gate that eats people, the strange rules of the game, and the ever-changing nightmare world appear in front of you Everything starts from here

name: Broken God Awakening
description: "If you don't want this city to be in ruins, let me stay here for one night." Seeing the girl in black who forcibly broke into her house, Mikage Du couldn't understand the meaning of her words at this fashion.

name: Lianhai Billiards Club
description: "Lianhai Billiards Club is a game that combines the elements of role-play and billiards leisure, telling the story of the lonely protagonist who grows up from an unruly delinquent to a shining professional billiards star with the companionship of his friends.

name: Solana and Sunny's Atelier
description: "Solana and Sunny's Atelier" is an RPG that focuses on collecting materials, synthesizing items, and completing requests. The main element of this RPG is crafting.

name: Soul of Hometown
description: This is an open world multiplayer RPG game. You can do anything in this vast world. Explore, fight, trade, build, cook, keep pets, solve puzzles, and study magic!

name: Across the Galaxy: Infinite War
description: This is an endless interstellar war. You are sent to the battlefield by the mysterious organization to test the combat capability of the latest experimental spacecraft, and help collect as much battlefield information about the major factions as possible.

name: AC-130 Gunship Operator
description: In AC-130 Gunship Operator game you will seat in chair of armament operator of three most powerful gunships in the world. As first, we are pleased to offer to gamers Russian artillery aircraft AN-12 Aurora and Chinese Y-9 Hawk. Prepare for lead rain from the sky and great emotions.

name: Abunka
description: Abunka is a strategic action-packed team arena brawler. Experience the unique combination of MOBA meets RTS and challenge your friends in a fast-paced battle for survival. Think smart & act fast for you are the one to decide who wins the battle for existence!

name: A Broken Halo
description: A Broken Halo is a 2D Puzzle game. You play as Zime, an angel that had her Halo destroyed by an evil mage. Now, she has to recover the broken pieces of her Halo and destroy her nemesis. Is Zime going to survive this challenge?

name: Abglantz
description: Enter a realm of nightmares and claw and shoot your way through hordes of bloodthirsty vermin and things that are much, much worse in this retro FPS

Climatic side scroller where history plot intermingles with Slavic legends, Second World War, and paranormal activity. Solve complex puzzles, do some platforming, interact with various characters, discover their unclear motives, and be a part of the dark and forgotten mystery.

name: Caveshifter
description: Caveshifter is dungeon-crawling roguelike focused on melee combat and dark athmosphere. You're about to explore massive cave network while fighting off dozens of enemies.

name: Ready Set Sumo!
description: Ready Set Sumo pits up to four players and their crazy characters against each other to triumph in the ring. Battle to be the last one standing as you fight your way to victory, whacking and thwacking each other with out of this world weapons.

name: The Broken Balance
description: Shoot your way through the worlds only zombie prison. Infected lives will not let you leave. Jump, run, swim, and tear your way passed hordes of undead. It only gets worse from here.

name: Shargad: First Blood
description: He drew the first blood. Winter is named after him, carrying its perishing winds to the very essence of his legacy. Enten, son of Adapa, killed his brother, staining the honour of his unborn descendants and leaving them a burden to carry for ages...

name: The Brothers
description: The Brothers is a classically styled 2D JRPG featuring Octopath Traveller inspired combat, with modern features you can't live without: Auto saving, quest logs, a built in encyclopaedia and a digital manual just scratch the surface.

name: Stack It
description: Stack various objects alone, together or against each other to build the highest tower you can.

name: Interlayer
description: Find out what lies in the realm between two opposing universes with up to 4 players in co-op! Evolve your cybernetic suit and weapon by using them, construct outposts, automate resource gathering, and find out what secrets the Wardens of this place want to keep hidden. But most importantly, survive.

name: Bloodpire
description: Bloodpire is a medieval fantasy roguelike top-down action game. The empire has been invaded by a group of vampires and other undead, they are capturing innocent civilians and using them as food. Will you be the hero of the empire or will you make a different choice?

name: Food Empire
description: Build your very own Food Empire in this economic strategy game. From diners and burger joints to succesful restaurants, with everything in between, you decide how to expand your brand. Buy properties, design the look of your restaurant, hire staff and finally feed all those hungry customers!

name: Rainbow Hills
description: An old school platformer inspired by the greats of the 80s. Rainbow Hills focuses on a tight controls, smart level design, good game feel, and bubbles!

name: Skeleton Attack: Nightmare Awaken
description: Fight against different types of creatures using magic, agility, strategy and strength in a third-person action game.

name: Mixed Guns
description: Thirsty for a good old Side Scrolling shoot 'em up? Well i got ya covered, fight your way through levels, covered with countless unique enemies, grab your guns and mix them togheter with sick upgrades, to create even sicker guns!

name: Shenanigans
description: Shenanigans is a chaotic party board game for you and your friends, where anyone and anything can change the course of the game at will. Don't let pesky rules stop you from winning. Just change them in your favor!

name: Dream Fight Will
description: This is an exciting and interesting action clearance game. You control all the enemies you defeat to fight. The game can be a single player, a duel with two people, a team of five people, a 10v10 battle, a melee with 25 people, and so on!

name: Soda-Powered Penguin
description: Control a soda-propelled penguin in this fast-paced precision platformer!

name: Escape from the Marble Monster
description: Rotate the world, physics will move the marble. Dodge obstacles, collect stars, lead monsters to a quick death, a journey against the clock full of challenges and fun.

name: Undone Mind
description: 2D-Action-Platformer with terrain transformation. Place tiles to reach new heights, block incoming projectiles, or hide yourself from the enemy. All abilities/weapons acquired are equipped at all times. Stand still and hold fire for a laser beam, move and fire for a bubble, move and hold to roll…

name: Gobs of Glory
description: A multiplayer PvP and PvE combat RPG true to the 5E SRD ruleset!

name: Speedy Spears
description: Speedy Spears is a casual 2d duel of the classic knight tournament where knights riding on a horses with spears. Players take on the role of 1 of 2 knights, whose task is to throw the opponent off the horse and not fall yourself.

name: Googoo: Bash!
description: Googoo: Bash! is an action platformer where you'll be bashing and snatching projectiles using Googoo's shield-pack! Help rescue the royal family by destroying the evil monsters and fearsome bosses that have taken over his sacred lands.

name: King's Reign
description: Become a King of the mystical and mysterious land of Thalendaar. Rule a magical Kingdom by indirectly influencing your people's actions. Expand your cities, gather resources, and protect your citizens from mystical monsters in this lighthearted strategy game.

name: Soulveyor
description: Build and craft your very own land, explore the world, work together with friends, and duel your way to becoming the best Soulveyor to ever walk the face of the planet, by sealing souls inside of your scrolls.

name: Freakland
description: An exciting and fun platform game. play with a fancy computer head full of dangling wires. I know, it may sound weird, but hey, you're in Freakland bro!

name: A Peculiar Adventure on Bast
description: Join two colorful heroes from opposite sides of the continent as they stumble into the adventure of their lives. Crazy gadgets, charismatic characters, a hint of the uncanny - you'll find it all in the beautifully hand-drawn steampunk world of Bast!

name: Knighty
description: Join the Royal Tournament! Knighty is a funny multiplayer party game with dozens of different knightly competitions waiting for you. Avoid obstacles, compete with others, make your way to the top and fight for the Knighty title. There can be only one winner!

name: Cozy Cabin
description: Fish, farm, and mine in a quiet, rainy town.

name: Daily Dungeon Club
description: Crawl a new dungeon every day, competing against the world in this bite-sized turn-based strategy game. Start fresh each run and use your wits and strategic shop rolling to score as many points as you can.

name: Supersonic Fight
description: Pilot the F/A-18C Hornet on missions over the San Francisco Bay Area. Complete the single-player story and play online in multiple game modes including: Dogfight, Team Dogfight, Capture the flag, and VIP.

name: Loose Life
description: Find yourself in the middle of the humanitarian horror of war. You have no weapons, and you are not a soldier. You only have a life and the way you want to survive. Write your story. Maybe you will lose life. Maybe you'll live loose. It all depends on your decisions, which always have consequences.

name: A Chamber of Stars
description: The rise and fall of a rock n' roll star. The sequel to 2018's The Endless Empty.

name: Vicious Vine
description: Be a worm and wreak havoc on the land. Use your hands to swing your body around, sticking to anything you come into contact with.

name: Lost Intelligence
description: Explore and defend yourself as you navigate a mysterious labyrinth to decide the fate of Boxer, an entity trapped in a computer in this wireframe dungeon crawler.

name: Chess Corp
description: ChessCorp - an indie puzzle game that takes you to a pixel art world to solve the mystery of your existence. Tackle AI-generated chess puzzles, develop your own thinking machine, and win the Grand Tournament. This is the only way.

name: City Worlds
description: City Worlds is a city builder where your playstyle directly impacts the environment and people of your cities.

name: Happy Animal Testing
description: Do you trust your friends? Happy Animal Testing puts your faith in your friends under a microscope. This multiplayer puzzle-platformer will see if your relationships survive testing.

name: Brawler Bro's
description: Brawler Bro’s is an arcade kickboxing beat em up title featuring challenging fights against Ai and human opponents. Each fighters stats are dynamically adapting to the situation of the fight leading to challenging encounters which always leave room for a comeback story of the underdog.

name: Brewmastery: Tavern Simulator
description: Brewmastery is an innkeper & beer brewery simulator. Build your own brewery and revive the old Tavern. Develop your territory, grow ingredients and try different recipes in a realistic brewing process. Tavern guests can tell you stories & give tasks. And don't forget to pull apart drunk Orcs!

name: Trail of Nanook
description: Trail of Nanook is a co-op game that takes you on an arctic survival adventure. Team up with your Inuit twin and build igloos, raise your huskies to sled over ice plains, fish, hunt and craft your tools to survive the harsh environment.

name: Knights of Frontier Valley
description: Knights of Frontier Valley is a highly replayable survival RPG where no two games are the same. Take on the role of an adventurer and guide him through his life in a unique and dynamic world. Gain fame and fortune, while never losing sight of the most important goal: staying alive!

name: Might of Merchants
description: Might of Merchants combines an economic and trading simulation with role-playing elements in a medieval kingdom. Experience a unique and lovingly hand-drawn world in which you have to prove your skills as a merchant.

name: Cat and Watermouse
description: Cat and Watermouse is a combination of modern endless runners and old school 2d platformers. Can you dodge the obstacles, defeat your enemy, and forge a new alliance along the way?

name: Tribal: Slavene Kingdoms
description: A party-based RPG in a hand-drawn environment, representing a fantasy setting based on Slavic mythology and folk tales. Tactical combat with simultaneous planning of character actions, designed specifically to improve upon the slow, turn-based gameplay, especially when playing in multiplayer.

name: Jackalope
description: Jackalope - is a psychological horror, with supernatural elements. You have to survive in a dangerous forest and not go crazy, defend yourself from monsters, solve puzzles and be prepared for the worst. You can play Jackalope alone or with your friends (up to 4 people).

name: Macabre Museum
description: Macabre Museum is a 1-4 player co-op adventure horror game. Explore the mysteries of a museum like no other; alone or with friends. Wield historical weapons, defeat different monsters, avoid brutal traps, and solve strange puzzles as the exhibits come alive at night…

name: Autopanic
description: Autopanic is a minimalist twinstick shooter with rogue-like elements. Also a game about acknowledging player action.

name: Pit Fighter Tycoon
description: Slavery. Violence. PROFIT. You're an alien slaver - abduct humans to build the most powerful gladiator team in the universe! Surgically enhance your slaves, or grind them down for profit. Become the worst kind of corporate overlord in this strategic auto-battler & management game.

name: Blades of Heroes: Samurai Rising
description: An Action Adventure 3rd person hack and slash game set in Mythological Japan. Travel as a trio of Samurai Heroes and switch between them as you fight enemies with the help of an Ally system. Perform special combo attacks as you travel across Japan, hell-bent on destroying the forces of evil.

name: Potion-Maker's Apprentice
description: A short exploration game where you are left in charge of the potion shop while your mentor is away for the weekend. It's up to you, apprentice, to keep this magical business afloat!

name: Intergalactic Transfer Station
description: Build & manage your Intergalactic Transfer Hub. Receive travellers and dock ships. Help passengers transfer, but also control them. Expand hub, build shops, take care of everyone's needs. Increase profits, change taxes. But beware: dangerous diseases and asteroids may alter your plans!

name: The Wizardz Dungeon
description: A difficult, fast-paced action-rogue-lite where you hack n'slash your way through a dungeon full of loot and monsters. Your goal is to get strong enough to be able to defeat the Guardian. Death means starting over again.

name: Dexter Stardust: Returns to Outer Space
description: An SNES-Inspired, platforming, sci-fi adventure. It's like playing a Saturday Morning Cartoon!

name: Obliviverse: Idle Adventures
description: March your way to victory with tons of playable characters in a frantic clickfest to save the Obliviverse from the forces of evil! Recruit new and exciting heroes and grow more powerful with each loop.

name: Persian Empire Builder
description: Dominate the ancient world economically and conquer it leading the greatest empire known in history of mankind. As a ruler of Persia build cities, roads and aqueducts, develop your economy, settle disputes, issue orders to armies and fleet.

name: Shopping Mall Renovator
description: Build the mall of your dreams! Clean, renovate and decorate old shopping malls and halls to get the best ratings from your visitors. Manage, invest and risk to get a fortune!

name: Death by Refund
description: When you hire private detective Frederick Ugarte for a job, be sure you don't change your mind, or you might get a refund you couldn't even begin to imagine.

name: Racoonie: Legend of the Spirits
description: Become the Racoonie! A small, yet courageous adventurer traveling through Everland to collect the blessings of the four great animal spirits.

name: Follow My Steps
description: Lead and protect a mother wolf and her pup seeking a new shelter. Use your magic to explore a dreamlike open world through numerous environments. Make the right choices to take care and educate your cub. Survive together and try to escape from the Midnight Pack…

name: Vox Siege
description: Vox Siege is a an Action-RPG Tower Defence game. Where you play as a hero who build towers and use hero abilities to help defend Vox on their journey to close all dark portals that is wrecking their land Fiora.

name: Norigin
description: Norigin is a third person story driven adventure exploration game centred around a son reconnecting with his father through lost memories. Take control of our lost travelling protagonist during his journey of self discovery as you become intertwined in this gripping and emotional origin story.

name: The Alien Creature
description: Try to escape The Alien Creature, an atmospheric horror puzzle game that tests your skills... and your nerves. Gather weapons and tools that will help you defend yourself as you search for a way off this forsaken planet.

name: Secret Meadow
description: Secret Meadow is a cozy hand-drawn sandbox RPG where you play as a fairy. Your goal is to grow your very own magical garden in the middle of a dark forest. Secret Meadow blends gameplay elements from base-building games, farming simulators, and survival sandbox and classic retro RPGs.

name: The Legend of Gandar II
description: The Legend of Gandar II takes place four years after the events of The Legend of Gandar. The Legend of Gandar II is again based on an 2D action-adventure video game.

name: Prison King
description: Sentenced for innocence… And now you need to learn how to survive. Navigate the prison life, make deals with guards and gangs alike, manage and sell contraband, and plot your next move. Your goal: to get out.

name: Dash the Fox & Three Dreadful Pigs
description: Do you know how hard is to be a teenage fox among the three crazy pigs trying to get power in the dark forest? Explore the story in action adventure platformer in Beat'em up style. Join Dashe's crazy adventure, run jump, dash & smash, bring the forest peace and solve the most fascinating mystery.

name: I Can't Find Me
description: There was an attempt to kill you. You died, but you didn't die. You lost your soul, but you didn't. You wake up in that horrifying town and don’t know what actually happened to you, and you want to figure out while surviving and trying not to die again once and for all.

name: Olympian Knights
description: Play as your favorite Greek God or Goddess and fight for Olympus

name: Malicious Mages
description: Malicious Mages is a capture the flag brawler -- Choose from a various cast of magic users and battle it out against other players to capture the mysterious blue orb.

name: Division of Labour
description: Division of Labour is a dark comedy management sim. In it, you take the role of The Manager and run a factory in a developing nation. You must make a tidy profit while making moral decisions to balance the welfare of workers against the demands of Overseer Corp.

name: Goofy Dungeon
description: Goofy Dungeon is a light-hearted puzzle game built from the ground up for VR. Explore dungeons, interact with objects and the environment, solve puzzles, complete quests and collect trophies!

name: Bunker Renovator
description: Find and buy abandoned bunkers and underground shelters to turn them into an estate of your dreams - a shop, a modern flat, a warehouse or maybe even an underground club!

name: MonsterCare
description: MonsterCare is a management-simulation game, where you play as the manager of a shelter for homeless monsters. Try to avoid it spiraling out of control, and get rich in the process!

name: Candy Kombat
description: Immerse yourself in a world of sweets, which is full of delicious candy. Beat the odds as a sweet frog to find Pinkie and Gingerbread man, to whom you need to explain some things.

name: Fantasy Network
description: Fantasy Network is a metroidvania game with a social media twist - a socialvania! Explore the colorful world of Holua and chat to hand-drawn, larger-than-life characters to discover a story that runs deeper than it may seem.

name: Darkest Abyss
description: Darkest Abyss is a platform/action game inspired by the Classic-Vania genre.

name: Funny Bunny Gun
description: The game is a cartoon-style Metroidvania. Explore winding mazes, ancient temples, and fiery caves. Fight in fast-paced battles against aggressive oversized vegetables and mutant beetles. Gear up with customizable guns to stop the inhumane experiments of a mad scientist!

name: Bakudan Hero
description: Bakudan Hero is a game where you push blocks to clear the way for the Cat-bus to pass. Can you find the best route using the fewest bombs?

name: Planet Morph
description: Alterux, the brand-new alien species with a unique property: It can morph its body into any kind of creature, organic and inorganic alike. Use this power to explore new worlds, combat alien enemies, and unlock creatures to become!

name: Barbarian Kingdom
description: Among the sands of the desert, a settlement is emerging that has a chance to become an empire. Be the ruler and decide on its shape, build a well-functioning kingdom with enormous strength and prestige, or become a ruthless Barbarian conquering unconquered lands. What strategy will you choose?

name: Bog Witch
description: BOG WITCH is an action arcade game where you play as a BOG WITCH stopping intruders from entering your bog. Protect your hut from goblins, businessmen and other invaders by hurling potions at them, because face it, as a BOG WITCH the last thing you want in your bog is anyone else.

name: Lost In Parallels
description: Explore the infinite dimensions of Lost in Parallels using your flash light ! Collect key objects to access new dimensions ! Challenge your friends and try to put the best score on the speedrun leaderboard !

name: Lost Sector
description: Explore the sci-fi world of Lost Sector and master the souls-like combat. Defy overwhelming odds to overcome evolving creatures and gradually changing environments in this unforgiving third-person action-roguelike.

name: Monkey Valley
description: Explore the deep jungle in search of your grandpa, engage with the locals, discover dark secrets about the valley and choose its and subsequently your own fate...

name: Mythica Adventures
description: The warrior elven Xyrra must get to the mountains to free her sister, who has been kidnapped and imprisoned in the dungeon. Complete levels, collect artifacts, defeat the Demon and free your sister. Classic 2D arcade platform game. Sword fight with monsters and the final fight with the Evil Demon.

name: Kriegsfront Tactics
description: Kriegsfront Tactics is a procedural turn-based mecha tactics RPG set in alternate 1970s during an era of conflict in Southeast Asia where you'll play as a commander of a mecha squad sent behind enemy lines. Build your mecha squad, complete missions, and survive the front another day.

name: Black Dog Bar
description: Black Dog Bar is a dialog-based bartender simulator. Each client has its own story. Communicate, mix cocktails, and... manipulate. It is only you who decides where the complicated story of each hero will turn and what will happen to them when they leave the bar.

name: Books in Wrong Places
description: Books have always been important to you. They were your guides, your friends. Your escape from everyday problems. But while you were gone some of them have gone missing. Find the misplaced books. Take care of the ones that have been mistreated. Put them back where they belong.

name: Locksmith Simulator
description: Become a local hero! Fix doors, open locks and help damsels in distress.

name: Farm Renovator
description: Buy a ruined farm and give it its full glory back. Clean, repair, restore, improve. Repair machines, manage the work on your farm, take care of your animals, and choose your development strategy. We're sure you'll have many satisfied customers.

name: GhostCry Hill
description: 《鬼哭岭》是一款以中国岭南地区都市传说为题材的恐怖解谜游戏。故事讲述九十年代一名在校女大学生，无意中卷入了一起都市传说之中，被困学校的她，迎接她的真相即将是...

name: Hecatomb
description: A new old first person shooter. Shoot cultists and escape from their compound before they summon a demon that ends the world.

name: Gazelle in a Winter Coat
description: Some top-down narrative adventure whimsy | A pixel and Ink world, seeped in mystery | Magic, tea, and music to note | ...something something... | Gazelle in a Winter Coat!

name: He's Nut Your Princess
description: Fight with June in this Metroidvania, as you bust through the unknown with the hopes of rescuing your boyfriend, who has been mistaken for a princess and kidnapped by a serious nutcase. Will your relationship survive the cracks of this new adventure or if it drown in the nuts of your enemies?

name: Dead of Winter
description: Build, gather and defend against relentless hordes of undead as you lead your villagers to safety and battle for survival in a world plunged into a seemingly endless winter

name: Breaking the Silent Lies
description: Breaking the Silent Lies - He has to relive the trauma from his past in order to save her.

name: Long Gone
description: Decades after the outbreak, you play as a survivor stranded in an old-world suburban neighborhood. Explore the lives of people Long Gone through their forgotten belongings and uncover secrets as you search for supplies in this 2.5D pixel puzzle platformer inspired by adventure games of old.

name: Coffee Bar Renovator
description: Create and expand a global café franchise! Start locally and expand your business around the world! Buy old, abandoned premises, renovate them, plan the decor and open the place of your dreams. It's easy to make money at Coffee Bar Renovator!

name: Mini Mart
description: Stock up and rejuvenate your quaint mini mart as you build friendships in this relaxing, short, mini town sim.

name: Hell Boba Café
description: Get ready to mix drinks and date demons! Prepare delicious boba tea with demonic ingredients. Make dialogue choices and flirt with a devilish cast of customers and build new relationships. Enter the cute & spooky world of Hell Boba Café!

name: Moonatics
description: MOONATICS is a hyperactive 2D fighter with a focus on KICKING ASS... featuring a colourful cast of freaks and misfits, rollback netcode, and stylish hand-drawn animations OOZING with character!

name: Milksoup
description: Milksoup is an FPS tower defense about a bunch of nerds trying to steal your cereal. Movement is key as you strafe through the surreal environments, hitting enemies with your silver spoon.

name: Headz Go Racing
description: Stylized cartoon casual racing sim/game.

name: Legends of the Brawl
description: Beat up some baddies, grab loot and occasionally punch your buddies in quick co-op mission games with classic action platforming gameplay. Complete quests to collect rewards and materials, upgrade your legends, and create new strategies to battle nightmares all over the world.

name: Epoch Ultra
description: Epoch Ultra is an exciting new survival game that challenges you and your friends to persevere through a dystopian cyberpunk future. Build, craft, and fight to shape the places around you and become the ultimate architect to the fate of your world.

name: Clarice: The Storyteller
description: Clarice, a young storyteller, teaches her secret to a disillusioned Dungeon Master and helps him create unforgettable adventures!

name: Escape the Huntsman
description: Use your wits to help Elesa escape her confinement. Unravel the truth behind the Huntsman's behavior. Immerse yourself in this point and click adventure where choices matter.

name: Moses: From Egypt to the Promised Land
description: Moses: from Egypt to the promised land is a first person adventure game inspired by one of the most amazing stories in human history from the Old Testament. In the game, we play the role of Moses, the holy prophet, the leader of the Israelites, during their journey to the Promised Land.

name: Myth Caller: The Nightmare Shaman
description: Myth Caller: The Nightmare Shaman is a 3D collectathon platformer fused with a monster-catching RPG! Catch monsters, collect permanent upgrades, and unlock even more of this huge 90's-inspired world.

name: Loggerhead
description: Loggerhead is a classic style survival horror game set in Australia, during the 1980's. Featuring fixed camera angles, challenging puzzles and limited resources, Loggerhead will take you on a journey into the dark heart of Australia. Can you survive the horrors of Boggarogga Creek?

name: In Dreams of Addict 2
description: "In Dreams of Addict 2" is the sequel to the re-release of the original game. Now his girlfriend Lisa will fight for Jora, who out of despair has decided to experiment in order to get into jora's mind. Help the girl to cope with hostile subconscious creatures, find jora and leave his world.

name: Blue Print
description: play a sandbox with infinite possibilities.

name: Potion Pipeline
description: Build huge factories to harvest magical resources and produce potions. Design complex production lines from simple parts to transform ingredients using a deep alchemy system. Ramp up production to fulfill Guild orders, unlock new machines, and create more powerful potions!

name: Please, Come Back Before Winter
description: Please, come back before winter is a poetic adventure game. Play as Naëlle the brave little mouse and find your lost siblings, grieving after the passing of your adoptive mother. Mark your way as you explore an inconstant world to get home as fast as possible before winter arrives!

name: Planet Rhythm
description: A mind-bending rhythm game with unique mechanics for every level, crisp inputs that leave your jaw hanging, and a really cool alien sidekick that helps you discover the secrets behind the worlds in this corner of the galaxy, each seemingly created around a music genre.

name: Princess hunter
description: Lead a party of monstergirl princesses on an exciting journey across a variety of worlds. Explore hand-drawn locations, fight numerous enemies in turn-based card battles and find keys to the hearts of your companions!

name: Project Imperium
description: Project Imperium is an open-world medieval sandbox. As serf or liege, smith, trade, farm, build, or conquer your way to fortune, glory, and a thriving medieval kingdom. Use your skills in construction, warfare, and crafting to build great towns and castles, then defend them from your enemies.

name: Puppet Master
description: A chaotic ragdoll physics fighting game where you take on the puppet masters of this world. Yes, it's Controversial! Choose your country to fight in and climb the pyramid to the top, if you can make it there! Don't lose your limbs! Make all the money you can and become the master of this world.

name: Red Trigger 2
description: Red Trigger 2 is an FPS Puzzle Game inspired by Portal, Antichamber and more. Use a gun that can expand or retract red blocks, but you can only expand three at a time, so you'll need to manage your energy wisely. Those red blocks are used in many different and ingenious ways.

name: Rescue Operations Simulator
description: Rescue Operations Simulator is a game where you play the role of USAR (Urban Search and Rescue) member and a team leader. You will arrange and execute rescue operations from real life catastrophic events that shocked and changed the whole world.

name: Serious Sally
description: Serious Sally is the daughter of a very serious man. She wants to be just like her father. Her adventure is for you to follow in this old-school first-person shooter created with respect for the good old classic games of the genre. Just pure fun and violence for those who love it.

name: Seranu
description: Find lost treasure, fame and fortune in the ruins of the Lost City! SERANU brings spelunking to the PC in a single-player adventure full of puzzles and mysteries.

name: Scrap Seas
description: Scrap Seas is a Vehicle 3rd-Person Shooter Action Rogue-Like. Build your ship and fill it to the brim with every kind of weaponry you can find. Then take it out into the ocean to take part in fast-paced generated sea battles against your Robot Overlords.

name: Somewhen
description: Fight, fish, build, cook, and invent your way through 8 chapters guaranteed with hours of play through a unique dungeon stage system, turn-based combat, and challenges. Collect hundreds of items. Built a town? Migrate special NPCs to them! Invent new weapons and trinkets! Restore the world!

name: SobokoSnake
description: Combining the powers of two classics, Sokoban and Snake, this game presents you with a series of increasingly difficult puzzles. Push boxes, fill pits and open doors to clear the levels by eating all the food while trying not to get yourself stuck.

name: Silent Bloom
description: Explore Between Two Worlds, Mortal And Spiritual As You Solve The Mystery Behind A New Devastating Supernatural Phenomenon.

name: Shattered Star
description: Shattered Star is a small indie game made by 3 action game enthusiasts that tends to combine hack&slash and roguelike gameplay together to let you have the most fun out of it. There is no storyline due to the limit of 3 part-time developers. Just drop, kill, and have fun.

name: SPQR: Crime Stories in Ancient Rome
description: SPQR is a mystery thriller drama about a PTSD ridden legionary turned detective, whose cases lead him spiraling deeper into a web of deceit, corruption, and murder when he unmasks a powerful cult with a plan to destroy the republic.

name: Steampunk Gravity
description: Steampunk Gravity is an action-simulation game where you pilot a ship, in the air and in the sea, with the objective of recovering very heavy explosive charges through confined spaces underground.

name: Strange Dungeon
description: Find allies, friends, or lovers as your crew explores, researches, and negotiates their way through this turn-based tactical roguelike about convincing cave monsters not to kill you. Make smart decisions to avoid vicious perils like nuclear meltdowns, panic attacks, and badly seasoned fish.

name: Summoner's Tale
description: Summoner’s Tale is an Action-Platformer monster collecting game in a new way! Collect Monsters, discover their unique abilities, build your dream squad and fight your way to save the world!

name: The Lightnwatchers
description: The Lightnwatchers is a 2.5D shooter and fighting game. In the future, humans open the portal connecting the other world. The Lightn, an organization that guards human cities, welcomes a new agent "J". He will guard the city while facing the threat from the other world with his friends.

name: The King's Tournament
description: The King's Tournament is a party game playable with up to 4 players in Online and Local Multiplayer. TKT is a fun party game, with a replacement of the board game phase by transforming it into an intense combat phase with various items and endless customization.

name: The Hustle
description: The Hustle is an open-world board game about GETTING RICH: avoid government overreach, ruin real-world friendships, and go anywhere - anywhere - to build your empire from the bottom up.

name: The Hunt of the Blood Moon
description: The Hunt of the Blood Moon offers a first person murder mystery experience. Interacting with friends and other people from all over the world to find out who is the mythological creature that’s trying to kill everyone else. Win by killing the creature, before it kills you.

name: The Blue Cat
description: The Blue Cate is a game about a little girl who finds a cat and learns about love and compassion.

name: Tales of Elendar
description: Tales of Elendar is a 3rd person and top-down RPG focusing on gameplay, especially on combat mechanics, allowing wide control of special abilities usage, while offering a well prepared lore and story with few dialog reading and noticeable philosophical content.

name: The brave loves the body of the devil
description: Tucker's goal is to become a heroic brave, and for this he embarked on a journey to defeat the devil, but after seeing the devil, he has a brand new goal-to make the devil his own woman!

name: The Dancer: Definitive Edition - Revolution
description: Take back Brazil(?) As the elusive Bronze mothership threatens to destroy the country in this brand new Dancer adventure!

name: Sword Islands
description: Get reborn as an adventurer and master your blade in a VR experience designed with action and exploration in mind. Go solo or join your party, with up to 4 players co-op campaign.

name: Suspicious
description: An online party game of teamwork and deception for up to 8 players, with full VR support for increased immersion. Experience incredible stories unfold as you and your friends discover who is the killer!

name: The Overthrow
description: The Overthrow is an RPG slasher game with one life, with hardcore arena battles, a special leveling tree and a system of procedurally generated enemies. In the game you have to be one of the recruits of the squad to overthrow the government. The world is inhabited by robots with humanoid AI.

name: The Pepper Prince: Episode 5 - A Royal Descent
description:
He's found. But his heart is broken into a thousand pieces. It is up to you to bring him back from the brink and return together to restore the kingdom!

This DLC unlocks Episode 5 of The Pepper Prince: Seasoning 1, a quirky point-and-click adventure about love, grief, and the power of friendship. Solve puzzles, meet quirky fairy-tale-inspired characters, and help your friend regain confidence and self-love after heartbreak!

name: Thistledown: Marrowroot
description: In a world riddled with dangerous magic, a half-dead opossum has to find the source of a toxic fungus that is threatening his family. Digging into dark, forbidden houses and dodging a murderous fairy named Barker, he discovers the problem is deeper than he ever would have dreamed.

name: Titan Shell
description: Titan Shell is a roguelike twin-stick platformer set in a dystopian world. Travel by shell, or by foot, across a massive mountain full of hazardous terrain, bloodthirsty mercenaries, and a ridiculously well-funded police force.

name: V Lights
description: V Lights is a 2D multiplayer horror game with eye-catching graphics. Set strategic traps on your opponent with items, light controls, and dash time.

name: Ven Adventure
description: Ven Adventure is a single-player 3D platform game. You happen to meet Ven on his unknown planet, invaded by Bruce Nelson, who wants to destroy the magical world.

name: Vayan
description: Arena combat alone or with others (1 to 4 players). Proudly defeat hordes of monsters and survive ever more diabolical chains of traps. Are you a Streamer? Take care! Your cat also participates in the competition!

name: Vampire Clans
description: Create the most powerful Vampire Clan, to take over Paris streets and underground. Challenge other clans, beat them and enslave. Use spells, alchemy and human blood to grow up your power. Become the terror of all inhabitants or use quiet politics to achieve your goals.

name: Ultimate Panzer
description: Drive your tank through abandoned and decrepit cities and battle the evil alien machines in this fast-paced and explosive action rogue-like

name: VR War Lab
description: Be yourself without restrictions in this physics-based VR sandbox shooter. Fight for the future of humankind, rise an empire, defeat the mightiest tyrants, explore new horizons, enjoy unmatched experiences with friends, and build your weapons, vehicles, and bases with your own hands.

name: War In Heaven
description: Chaotic boss-rush, bullet-hell-y, twin-stick arena shooter mayhem! Dynamically changing arena forces you to be vigilant: Watch the bullets, watch the walls!

name: Warp Soldier
description: A 2D retro monochrome Metroidvania adorned with a vast array of melee combos, movement options, and most importantly, monsters!

name: We Can Make It
description: You and your friends will team up to face the world in this third person challenge. Do your best to stay alive and try to be stealthy. This game has permadeath and relies on planning ahead so you can stay alive. Whether it be zombies, players, or AI, they are all out to get your blood.

name: WingMan
description: WingMan is a point & click adventure game, where you will embark on a whirlwind adventure with Tbone as his wingman. As we all know, It’s about taking one for the team, regardless of the circumstances. You and Tbone will go to different nightclubs to dance and flirt with ladies all around the world.

name: Wonder Land
description: An crazy platformer where every thing you collect can have a an impact on the game.

name: World At War 85 Digital
description: World At War 85 Digital is a dynamic platoon-level combat computer game based on the award-winning board games of the same series name. World At War 85 Digital series centered on armor, artillery, and infantry combat during 1985 World War 3.

name: Xuhivan's Autonomous Cube
description: Xuhivan's Autonomous Cube is a Roguelike Auto Battler, played on a twistable magic cube. Use the strengths and weaknesses of your units wisely to fight through a series of cubes, and reach the final boss before you exceed the number of allowed rotations.

name: Zeltoid X1
description: Help Zeltoid to save his planet by exploring the galaxy in search of zitoride, essential energy for life, craft new abilities, solve strange puzzles and find the reason for the mysterious disappearance of zitoride in the galaxy.

name: ZombieSquad
description: Fight The Voxelized Zombie Hoards in this FPS online Co-op Survival shooter. Survive, unlock more areas and powerups as you progress through a vast maze of post apocalyptic ruin. Purchase a gun from the wall or the "random mystery gun chest". Online Co-op 1-4 Players.

name: Frozen Sword: Countermark RE
description: Engraved War: Frozen Sword is a strategic battle flag game set in a sword and sorcery crossover story. The player takes on the role of a gamer who, by chance, travels to the world of his own story, where the world is slowly changing and he meets Princess Elisa, whose kingdom has been destroyed.

name: Find the light
description: is a 1st person adventure game. In the game, you played as a claustrophobic patient. The dark and narrow places is your biggest enemy. You must help avoid the darkness, find the light source, solve layers of mysteries, and finally escape from the danger.

name: Last Sapiens
description: Doomsday survival games. You can fight zombies, steal zombie supplies, the zombies will fight each other, and you can take advantage of them... The game takes place shortly after the human Dark Forest Strike

name: Artificial Extinction 2
description: Defend your base by strategically placing autonomous weaponry. Upgrade your defenses by mining resources. Unlock new tech to build more powerful weapons. Expand your territory to strengthen your defenses. When under attack from enemy Mechs, pick up your rifle and get in the fight!

name: Another Space Opera: Episode 1 - The Wake of The Giant
description: In 2297, Earth is united under a gestalt technocratic order - reborn from the ashes of nuclear fire. Now, humanity finds itself caught in the crossfire of a bloody, supernatural conflict for the fate of the galaxy. Hack and blast your way through this explosive, cinematic action platformer.

name: Anesthesia
description: When tragedy strikes, a young child has to go under anesthesia in order to save his life. When this happens, he imagines a fantasy island full of mystical wonder and creatures. After his procedure, he longs to go back to this world eventually killing himself.

name: Ancient Rituals: Stonehenge
description: Ancient Rituals: Stonehenge is a ludic VR experience, where you will experience our interpretation of an ancient pagan ritual. A ritual that is beyond linear time and three dimensional space.You are in an exploration to find yourself

name: Ancient Cultures: Tikal's Realm
description: Ancient Cultures: Tikal's Realm, is an action-adventure game that takes you to the height of one of the greatest Mayan civilizations. Become a legendary warrior of Tikal, train with the army of the time, explore mystical places of this mythology and finally, acquire the powers of the ancient gods.

name: All Hands on Deck
description: All Hands on Deck is a local co-op game. Play as a pair, act like one! This adventure requires cooperation. Combine and use various items together in this playful puzzle platformer.

name: Alien Defense Unit
description: Alien Defense Unit is a VR Tower Defense game where the player with his abilities and his friends are all that protects their tower.

name: Aegis Kingdoms
description: Aegis Kingdoms is an online life-sim RPG. Seek daring adventures in the scenic Sky Island continent of Ophelia alongside companions. Fulfil commissions, grow crops, raise animals, join friends delving into dungeons or explore the open online world.

name: Above Below
description: Above Below is a tree-growing simulator in which you can create your own unique tree. Manage resources to grow bigger and stronger. Strengthen yourself against the elements and threats that are determined to destroy you. Learn what makes a good tree great. From seed to tree the journey is up to you!

name: Masha and Medved
description: Russian folk tales and Internet memes meet together in erotic platformer for J2ME phones.

name: The Joy of Creation: Ignited Collection
description: The Joy of Creation: Ignited Collection is an upcoming bundle developed by Nikson. The collection includes complete remakes of two "The Joy of Creation" games, including Reborn and Story Mode. both these games will be remade from the ground up, with new assets, new gameplay, etc.

name: Bikini Balls 2: Christmas Edition
description: Erotic-themed Breakout clone for J2ME cellphones.

name: Amity Park
description: Amity Park is a Dating Sim/Visual Novel game based on the notable Nickelodeon television show, Danny Phantom. The game is a bit of a retelling of the show, most notably with the introduction of explicit adult themes and suggestive content. You play as Danny Fenton, a boy who has accidentally been gifted amazing ghost powers due to his father's incredible ghost dimensional gateway. He must now use his powers to defend his town from other rampant ghosts, save the girl next door, and still turn in his homework on time. With plenty of ghosts to meet, with just as many cute girls to explore, Amity Park invites you to Go Ghost. Amity Park is made in Ren'Py, and uses 2D character portraits and 3D background models, all made by hand.​

name: Tchow Rainbow
description:
In Rainbow, you direct light from the villainous D.D.'s Rainbow Ray through tricky levels in an effort to bring unwanted happiness and excitement to the inhabitants of a gray and mundane island.
While Rainbow's control mechanics are simple, crafty levels and puzzling hazards will test your reflexes and reasoning; and badges reward you for perfecting each level.

name: Mail Run Endless Delivery Rush
description:
Dedicated to celebrating (2016) 500 Glorious years of Royal Mail - The Official Mail of the UK.
Come help the amazing postal staff of Royal Mail deliver Mail all over London, while avoiding lovely London traffic of Double Decker Buses, Cars, police cars. Ride Loco, the Pink Elephant, collect money spread all over the streets and have the view of London like never before.
Your job for the day is to deliver mail by approaching the closest Red Mail Box, the mail is automatically delivered to the closest mail box, Yesss !! They have such magical technology !! Maybe you can find some wizards secretly hiding in plain sight as postal workers, you never know who will show up next !!

name: Flower Cells
description: Flower Cells is a highly enjoyable game. Once you start, you won’t want to stop. Try it, and see how high you can score. The goal is to group five or more flowers of the same color together. Once the flowers are grouped, your score increases, and the grouped flowers disappear to make room for more maneuvers.
