After each turn, more flowers appear on the board and your task becomes more difficult. The game is over when the board completely fills up. Enjoy the game!

name: The Lonely People
description: The game is a third-person open-world shooter in which you can hack, shoot, steal, and complete missions. We took making this game very seriously and we hope you will enjoy it, have a good day.PS: there is a control manual in the pause menu if you click on the "Controls" button.

name: Thelos
description: Your main ability is to place two crystals on a viable surface and pull towards them. You can use dashing, jumping, running, and perform a special jump which is available after collecting rewards. Your opposition will be two types of sentries, dragons, mines, and traps who all want to keep you down.

name: Generic Kart Racing
description: Generic Kart Racing is a celebration of the retro, 16-bit kart racers of old - a modern twist on the ol' tried and true kart racing formula!

name: Fantasy Triple Mahjong
description: Sin descripción

name: Bermuda Adventures
description: Explore island, build a farm, harvest crops and craft new recipes in Bermuda Adventures!

name: Idle Startup Tycoon
description: Sin descripción

name: Maxoo 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Dozie Penguins
description: Sin descripción

name: Epiphyllum in Love
description: Final chapter of the trilogy. In a world where memory can be controlled, everyone is selling their souls. "I" have left everything behind, except the girl named Yin who still remains in my mind. At the end of my life, should I die with a beautiful fantasy, or go in search of sad memories of her?

name: Dragon's Heaven
description: Dragon's Heaven is an incomplete and cancelled fighting game for the Neo-Geo. The game was being developed by Kengo Asai, who had previously worked on Voltage Fighter Gowcaizer and The Last Blade.

name: Project Alex
description: The mysterious Project Alex is an unsolved mystery that could change the world if solved

name: Northmen: Wrath of Vikings
description: Northmen: Wrath of Vikings is an isometric city-builder in the Viking Age. Conquer the lands of the North! Set up your camp and make it prosper. Go back to the roots of city building games.

name: Lofi Checkers
description: Lofi Checkers is a cozy take on a classic game. Play with the AI or a friend for a light, refreshing game of checkers. Nothing beats the simplicity of a straightforward game when you have a few moments.

name: Kvlt
description: Fight your way through armies of Nazi occultists, religious zealots, and unspeakable cosmic horrors to unveil the Eldritch secrets behind the war theatre in this 2000s-era-inspired grimdark singleplayer FPS where WW2 meets Cthulhu Mythos.

name: Roghill Incident
description: Roghill Incident is an Indie storytelling/exploration/kind-of-horror game that focuses on the story, while creating the uncomfortable feeling that something bad will happen soon.Find all the locations, notes and hints to get different endings.

name: FootPool
description: FootPool is an original pool game that mixes with the rules of soccer

name: Mikiwam
description: A cozy queer tea-making game created by an all-Indigenous team. As the healer’s apprentice, serve magic elemental teas to influence a colourful cast of characters. Connect with your estranged home, discover your gifts, and find your place in this post-colonial world.

name: Freestyle Mage
description: Freestyle Mage is a top-down action RPG game with lite rouge feature. The player will experience learning new magic during the battle, and build his own preferred battle style. Make the best use of synergy effect among spells to defeat different Crack Lords.

name: Pactus
description: A magician and a wendigo, wake up together inside a dark crypt. After centuries sleeping, you find yourself captive in the bowels of a massive cathedral. Only by working together will you find your way out...

name: Quoin
description: Quoin is a top-down game where you shoot enemies collect coins and upgrade your stats. With a wide choice of weapons to use each serving a different role, Quoin will keep you captivated with different enemy types, weapons, and play styles.

name: Shadowrun: Hong Kong - Extended Edition Deluxe
description: It includes the full 22-track, 320kbps Shadowrun: Hong Kong Soundtrack from fan-favorite composer Jon Everist, and a 125-page Art of Shadowrun: Hong Kong PDF showcasing a wide variety of the concept and production art that went into the game.

name: Bruce Lee: Iron Fist 3D
description: 3D figting game for J2ME cellphones featuring Bruce Lee.

name: Stranded: Escape Skull Cove
description:
Join the young adventurers Tom & Jen in a brand new adventure out on the tropical islands off the coast of Ascencion Island.
They begin the adventure taking a private flight over the islands but things quickly descend out of control!
Can you help Tom & Jen unravel the puzzles of Skull Cove island they find themselves stranded on? Immerse yourself taking in the sights and sounds of Skull Cove. Collect tools and solve puzzles to find a way off the island.

name: World of Trains
description: Discover the magic of the railway in the game World of Trains on the iPhone and iPad. Build your own railway and control the trains.

name: Microgue
description:
Climb a dark tower in this Micro sized Rogue-like that focuses more on
character movement, than stats and gear.
Can you retrieve the treasure and escape the dragon’s wrath?

name: My Little Booth Bundle
description: All three Little Booth games in one bundle!

name: Japanese Escape Games: The Mansion of Tricks
description: Investigate various areas and solve riddles in the Mansion of Tricks. Can you escape from the Mansion?

name: Resident Evil: During the Storm
description: A new Resident Evil 2 (1998) SourceNext mod that takes place during the first days of the Raccoon City outbreak. Playing as Kevin from the Outbreak series, you'll have to resist inside and outside the RPD, managing the few resources at your disposal and making sure that survivors don't die. For this, there will be new gameplay mechanics, and you'll have to choose carefully what you want to do, leaving room for dozens of outcomes. Not only your actions will affect the course of the story, but also the moment in which you do them, as there is an internal timer.

name: Star Trek Scene It?
description: A DVD game of Star Trek trivia!

name: Assassin's Creed: Codename Hexe
description:
Official details are thin on Hexe, but it appears to have a horror slant, and Cote said it would provide “a different experience” in terms of game and game structure. It is heavily rumored to be set somewhere in the Holy Roman Empire during the infamous Witch Trials that were prominent in the 17th century. "Hexe" is German for "Witch" and in itself hints towards this setting.

Project Hexe is being led by Clint Hocking, who previously worked on Far Cry 2 and Watch Dogs: Legion. It will launch into the Assassin's Creed: Infinity Hub.

name: Second Stone: The Legend of the Hidden World
description: A retro-inspired adventure RPG with beautiful handcrafted visuals.

name: Super Spin
description: A cancelled top-down racing action game for the Sega Genesis.

name: Marvel World of Heroes
description: In Marvel World of Heroes, players can create their own unique Super Hero identity and origin story. Players will need to patrol their neighborhoods to foil crimes, complete Super Hero missions, and thwart interdimensional threats. As players level up, they will unlock equipment and abilities, and will team up with Marvel Super Heroes such as Spider-Man, Wolverine, Captain America and others to battle iconic Super Villains and save the Multiverse from cosmic and earthbound threats.

name: Avatar: Reckoning
description: Avatar: Reckoning is a mobile game in development for the Avatar franchise.

name: O Salão Encantado
description: Sin descripción

name: Stellanova
description: Stellanova is a fast and seamless horizontal action-arcade shooter with expansive environments, vibrant pixel art, and stunning action set-pieces!

name: Nightmare on the Pacific
description: Sin descripción

name: Super Anime Waifu BBQ Simulator
description: Grill Guy needs Waifu's help! Tour the Glazed Fields looking for Grill Guy's lost BBQ sauce! Explore various mouth watering sections of the Glazed Fields, a mysterious place that somehow has floating hot dogs and ground beef mountains, is this even edible?

name: For Honor: Starter Edition
description: For Honor: Starter Edition gives you access to the story mode, all multiplayer modes, all maps and 6 playable heroes with 3 fully unlocked.

name: Graveyard Shift
description: Graveyard Shift is a 4-Player Co-Op game that focuses on problem solving, item management, and teamwork to get through the missions.

name: Airborne Kingdom: Deluxe Edition
description: Airborne Kingdom — the sky city builder. Grow your unique town among the clouds, and fly it across a wide-open landscape. Explore the skies to restore serenity to the world below. The Deluxe Edition includes the game's critically acclaimed original soundtrack!

name: The Final Battle: Adventure
description: The Final Battle is a funny point and click adventure game. The plot is happening at the age of the knights kingdom. Your character is a guy which wakes up lost in a prison cell with amnesia. He doesn’t even know who he is! Your task is to escape from the prison go to the city and find out the entire mystery behind your capture. And of course try to stay alive...

name: Janken Shogi
description: Sin descripción

name: Hyakusen Renma: Kyousha no Sengoku
description: Sin descripción

name: Station Memories
description: Sin descripción

name: Azurea: Sora no Uta
description: Sin descripción

name: Project H.A.Z.A.R.D
description: Sin descripción

name: Shin Omoide no Shokudou Monogatari: Kokoro ni Shimiru Showa Series
description: Sin descripción

name: Shiro Neko Tennis
description: Sin descripción

name: Alternative Girls 2
description: Sin descripción

name: Drop the Number
description: Sin descripción

name: Touhou Piano Game: Music Tiles
description: Sin descripción

name: Ta ga tame no Alchemist
description: Sin descripción

name: Lights e Shades: Safìna
description: A 2D turn-based fantasy RPG. Equipped; Grow; Aggregates; Form friendships; Uncover secrets; Fight; You decide. An original storyline, day / night cycle, freedom of action and what you do will influence the story.

name: Succubus: Onoskelis
description: Onoskelis DLC contains new armors, bodypaintings, voiceover, animations and much more!

name: Rhythm Good
description: Help GC Lady! Defeat the boss! Easy and cute painting style, and operation tips will appear before the start of each level. Challenge the high score!

name: Angst
description: Dive into the abyss of Angst, a first-person survival horror game. Explore the cube as a Private detective and try to survive. Discover its many secrets and maybe... Maybe you will escape...

name: Cosmo Vulpes
description: Cosmo Vulpes is a sci-fi adventure where your main tool is the jetpack. Play as Klaus, a bounty hunter fox, with his jetpack and other gadgets developed by his friend fennec Safira, complete his missions and explore new worlds.

name: Little Horror Raiser
description: Choose a little horror to raise then unleash it upon the world.

name: MetalCore
description: MetalCore is an NFT-based, open world, mechanized combat game. Fight alongside your faction in territorial battles on a mineral rich alien planet. Win vehicles and mechs, craft gear, recruit pilots, develop land, sell and trade gear and much more as players battle for planetary domination.

name: Master of Pieces: Jigsaw Puzzles - Summer Time
description: Free Summer Event returns as DLC, full of sun and fun!

name: Field of Glory II: Medieval - Sublime Porte
description: At the end of the thirteenth century, with the Seljuk Sultanate of Rum in terminal decline, Anatolia was divided into several small independent Turkish principalities, called beyliks.

name: A Few Minutes of Glory
description: A Few Minutes of Glory is a quick, text-based, yet still challenging distillation of THAT game, to satisfy your RTS craving on the go.

name: Fantasy Item Company
description:
Manage your own game fantasy item company and try to create a million-selling item in this unique simulation.
Hire talented people and train them to develop their skills.
As your staff gets more experience, you will unlock a wider array of item genres and content to create. Try to find the most popular combinations and make for the latest chain store!
Work hard and you may reach the top of the kingdom!

name: Huerons: A challenging Puzzle
description: Huerons are tiny circles arranged on grid. What do you have to do? You have to combine all the Huerons into each other leaving only one in the end. Sounds simple? You bet!

name: HexLogic: Lanterns
description: We've assembled a great collection of colorful lanterns to cast a vibrant glow - Chinese lanterns, oil lanterns, luminaries, and even Jack-O-Lanterns! HexLogic - Lanterns contains 69 puzzles of various levels of difficulty, based on 23 pictures.

name: The Story of a World
description: The Story of a World is an experience. There are things to discover and to unlock, and the primary point of this app is to create a meditative experience. You will have to be willing to let your mind relax, to think, to create your own understanding of what is happening if you are going to enjoy it.

name: Realistic Battle Tank
description: Realistic Battle Tank is a uniquely designed tank battle simulator game with realistic graphics & battleground tank physics. Participate in the world's largest tank battles on the world famous battlefields with the support of your allied forces. Use field tactics and your skills in order to reverse the course of history. Fight and win in this cruel but fascinating world of tank battles.

name: Real Horse 3D
description: Explore a whole equestrian world! Ride your horse in beautiful sceneries, do jump jumping, and take care of your horse! Experience the riding experience thanks to the first person view, just like real life!

name: Defcon 1: Alien Invasion
description:
Defcon 1: Alien Invasion is the best experience in strategy and realistic simulation.
Take control of an Alien breed, select a target country and begin a cosmic war against humankind for Earth control. Remember, you need to use all your hi-tech powers to destroy the humans and leave no one alive!

name: Air Plane Simulator
description: Air Plane Simulator is a uniquely designed flight simulator arcade game with relaxing gameplay and colourful, hand painted vibrant graphics. In Air Plane Simulator you would need to explore a surreal procedural generated world, flying through fantastical forms of impossible geometry. Collect orbs and watch out for the fuel all through the relaxing and atmospheric music.

name: Racing League: Car Race Games
description: Sin descripción

name: Rally Day
description: Sin descripción

name: Drift Station: Real Driving - Open World Car Game
description: Sin descripción

name: Ira
description: When a young archer named Yeon is chosen as a vessel by the soul of an ancient god, she must use her newfound power to defeat the agents of Chaos and restore peace. A bullet-hell shooter with procedurally generated levels and powerful weapon/item combos!

name: Dynasty Origins: Conquest
description: Sin descripción

name: Sudoku Samurai
description: Lose yourself in hours of satisfying sudoku puzzle solving. Beautiful art and music make this game you'll want to relax with when it's time to unwind.

name: Brave
description: In the action RPG "Brave", you'll handle a sword and magic, defeat an enemies and search for Orb unexploited somewhere.

name: Rocket Zap
description: Rocket Zap is an arcade style space shooter game. Destroy waves of Rockets, UFOs and Spaceships. Simple one touch control. Just swipe to aim and shoot. Designed for fun, simplicity and action. Thrilling chain-reaction explosions add a unique spin to the gameplay. You can orchestrate massive explosions as speeding mini rockets slam into exploding spaceships.

name: Batoni
description: Batoni is a top down adventure in the strange town of Mixito. You'll Role play as the "special agent". The agency sends you, to adventure and get to the bottom of what's happening in Mixito! And stop it, by any means necessary. In this dark eerie-puzzle adventure game you'll talk with citizens and try to solve the puzzle. Gather the right tools for the job and solve quirky puzzles.

name: Heroes Paradox
description:
Join Lugh’s adventures and save the Kingdom.
Build your own strategy by selecting your 4 best heroes.
Moreover, in the event stages, you can get even more heroes and epic items to make your team more powerful.

name: Craftbound
description: Craftbound is an MMORPG idle/incremental game with a clean interface and charming pixel art. Featuring many skills, combined with a player based economy, and in-depth mechanics.

name: Save the Pencil
description:
You are HB; young, sharp and full of lead. A pencil on a mission to join the dots but there’s a rebellion in the stationery cupboard! The paper clips, rulers, erasers and their friends are angry, and they’ll do anything to stop you. Guide HB to safety and collect the bonus stars to unlock more challenging levels!
Each of the 120 levels across 8 different chapters requires skill, logic and speed. Only the most precise tappers will be able to collect three stars on every level!

name: Siberian Survival: Cold Winter
description: Survive in really harsh and cold badlands - Siberia! Explore empty snow-covered forests to find water, food or wood to make fire! Don't get frozen! Use special survival tools hidden around or craft your own ones. Build a shelter with a fireplace to hide from freezing cold! Stay alive at all costs with Siberian Survival: Cold Winter 3D game! Do you feel the fear quaking with cold? Upgrade your survival skills hunting, gathering and crafting!

name: Ayumi's Little Adventure

name: Blöck
description: Blöck is a hardcore and challenging 2D Platformer. The goal is easy: Get to the level end as fast as possible and try not to die. But let's be realistic. You will die. A lot.

name: Silence of Switchblade
description: In the middle of summer, in the suburbs, in the river, a drowned body is floating. It seems like three-years-earlier incident replays. This story, through the investigation into the case, shows triangular relationship between a male police officer, a female police officer, and a female murderer.

name: Angry Birds Space Assault!
description: Angry Birds Space Assault! is a cancelled spinoff game from the Angry Birds series that was set in the setting of the game Angry Birds Space.

name: The Big Comfy Couch
description: The Big Comfy Couch is a cancelled game for the Xbox.

name: RecNaviClub
description: 9 kinds of games are included in the package. What was developed for prevention and recreation. There is a variety of games lined up for brain training, physical exercise, learning, and cognitive function testing.

name: Purge Force 2070
description: The Sputnik 986 space station is under attack by alien life forms. You and your team are part of the cleanup team that is supposed to rid the station of the alien. Secure and clear the station from the aliens.

name: Get it Hard
description: This next generation simulation of the most stressful situation in life gets you the training you need. Get stress resistant and get it hard as fast as you can!

name: Fallen Bride Mege
description: Mege is the childhood sweetheart of the protagonist. Lucky enough, he is able to marry Mege with everyone's blessing and lives a happy life. But the sudden news of layoffs broke his peaceful days.

name: Double Trouble
description: Meet Olivia and Elodie, two sisters on an adventure in an infinite imaginary landscape. Can you help them work together in order to discover what secrets are in store? Explore a colorful, infinite dream world in which to collect, build, unlock and more!

name: Run or Boom
description: This game is inspired by an old game. Eliminate other players and be the last one standing.

name: Input Chaos
description: A physics based multiplayer fighting game.

name: Manifest
description: This is a first person shooter game with 12 levels, every 3 levels the location changes from castle to forest, from forest to north pole and from north to another castle, you play as a nameless hero who wants to kill all the monsters.

name: Divinus Vanitas
description: This multiplayer souls-inspired spell-casting game sees you collecting equipment and finding new spells to help on your journey of proving your worth to the gods, and redeeming yourself from the cardinal sin of mortality. Explore the floating island and unravel the secrets of the fragmented world.

name: CapoeiRogue: Dandara Cordão de Ouro
description: CapoeiRogue is a rogue-like capoeira game that mixes Afro-descendant culture in Brazil and fantasy, through the game mechanics you will experience elements that were of great importance to our history.

name: Dragon Must Die
description: In the age of dragons, the most sexy and beautiful girls in the world are guarded by dragons, and they determine the fate of mankind. For the most noble freedom, for the highest quality genes, is it killing and plundering or heroism and redemption?

name: My Escort Company
description: Start your own Escort Company now! Join your mentor, recruit girls, build your company, get to know the girls better!

name: Mottia: The Gem Hunters
description: Classic Roguelike (turn based, tile based) RPG with a rich character building system.

name: Warrior
description: Warrior is a 2.5D Platform Action Adventure game set in a dark fantasy world.
